content: materials yarn - i used two strands of fingering held together and dk for mine but you can also use worsted 4 5mm hook stitch marker yarn needle & scissors beads or buttons and something to use for your drawstring if you don t want to use a crochet chain shell single_crochet half_double_crochet & double_crochet stitches used bag is about 4 inches deep from just under the drawstring round gauge is not important
